summary: Based on the paper by K. Hildebrandt, K. Polthier and M. Wardetzky. This paper introduces a way to detect the feature lines on a mesh based on utilizing discrete differential operators on piecewise linear meshes.
title: Smooth Feature Lines on Surface Meshes
